AbstractText.sentence: Tissue factor (TF) expression by peripheral blood monocytes during sepsis initiates intravascular thrombosis.

AbstractText.sentence: Bacterial lipopolysaccharide (LPS) rapidly induces TF gene transcription in monocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: The human TF promoter contains binding sites for the transcription factors AP-1, c-Rel/p65, Egr-1, and Sp1.
NF-kappa B/Rel proteins have been shown to physically interact with both AP-1 and Sp1 proteins.
